intro: Beccariella rubicunda, commonly known as the red beccariella, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes approximately 13,000 species of flowering plants. Beccariella rubicunda is often found in shaded, moist environments such as forests and undergrowth.
